roleset.name: spin off: create a new entity based on an existing entity

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Its plan, instead, is *trace* to spin off the remainder of its real estate unit and to possibly do the same with its mining and energy assets.
example.arg: the remainder of its real estate unit

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: Courtaulds PLC announced plans *trace* to spin off its textiles operations to existing shareholders in a restructuring to boost shareholder value.

example.name: passive, with attribute
example.text: The previous-year quarter included $16.1 million from businesses spun *trace* off as Tredegar Industries Inc.

example.name: with source
example.text: John tried *trace* to spin off several new papers from his shoddy research.
